subtitles.text: Hello and welcome to the Mia-Platform Video Pills.
In this video, we will see how to enable preview of new features on the Mia-Platform Console.
This will give you the opportunity to test the functionality of new products, understand how they fit into your software's lifecycle, and immediately give feedback to improve it.
Starting from the design area, we notice our default sidebar.
To activate the feature preview function, go to the top-right navigation bar and click on your profile icon, a dropdown menu is displayed.
Inside is a list of all the features you can preview and activate.
In this video, you will only see one: the “Dynamic Sidebar”.
Each feature will have a short description of the benefits and functionality it is intended to enable.
In addition, you will have the opportunity to give your feedback by clicking the button that will open Mia-Platform Github Discussions.
Clicking on the toggle you enable the feature.
If you refresh the page, you can see the new "More Feature" tab.
In this case, the default sidebar is switched to a different display mode.
Remember that enabled functions are only active for the user, triggering them not for the whole platform.
